name: Ash K
tagline: This is a tagline. Quite good, no?
body:
## Hi
I'm Ashish, and this is my website, which is currently hosted on github pages.

## About me
I'm a programmer by profession. I code website backends in Python, using Django.
I have 2 years of experience in that.
Apart from programming sites in Django, I am also fairly well experienced in
computer vision with OpenCV and Python.

## My works:
I spent most of my time in [CodeMyMobile](http://www.codemymobile.com)
All the projects except for the last one, were client projects during my stay
at CodeMyMobile.
* [Bookwithbit](http://bookwithbit.com)
* [CoSign](http://cosign.co)
* [CoSign for Publishers](http://publishers.cosign.co)
* [Friendly Deals](http://friendlydealsapp.com)
* ITSigma (client sold it, don't know where it's hosted now)
* [GetMeAShop](http://www.getmeashop.com/) - the awesome place I'm working at right now.
Note: Links of some the projects (except GetMeAShop) may not work, because it
could be that the clients took them down.

## More about me:
I love Python. Python is life, Python is love. This love story started in late 2011, when I for the first
time saw a guy open up his laptop's webcam programmatically with OpenCV and Python.
That was just... magic! I had seen Python code before that, but really hadn't seen why I'd
prefer it over C++ or Java.
Had it not been for the love I found for Python in 2011, I'd probably be bashing away some
Java madly at some stupid MNC. Thankfully, I'm not in that position, and I am very much grateful
that I write Python code daily to earn bucks.

Apart from programming, I ... <coming soon>
